abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews dance works performed by Mark Morris Dance Group, Lil Buck, the Joffrey Ballet and Trisha Brown Dance Company during opening night of the Fall for Dance Festival at City Center.
snippet: Mark Morris Dance Group and Lil Buck led off a varied opening program of the annual Fall for Dance Festival at City Center.
lead_paragraph: Mark Morris Dance Group and Lil Buck led off a varied opening program of the annual Fall for Dance Festival at City Center.

headline.main: From Sneakers to Point Shoes, a Parade of Styles and Movement
headline.print_headline: From Sneakers to Point Shoes, a Parade of Styles and Movement
headline.seo: Fall for Dance Festival at City Center - Review
